Articles.Content:
Can anyone else verify that using the undo hotkey (Ctrl+Z) in the VAB / SPH wipes out crew assignments?

This isn't only for "recently-assigned" crew members, like when the undo key wipes out tweakable adjustments made since the last part tree change.  I can add crew to my craft, launch it, revert (at which point crew assignments are still in tact), make any number of changes, and then as soon as I hit "Undo" my crew assignments are lost.

If this is confirmed as a bona fide bug, maybe while Squad is fixing this they could also add undo checkpoints for tweakable adjustments.

Edited May 11, 2016 by Fwiffo
